home.description: Here you will find a sample of my work and passion for web development. Explore and discover how I can add value to your project.

project1.description-testimony: En esta puse en practica el sistema....
project1.description-testimony-smoll: In this one I put in practice the system of a Json with different individual descriptions. Where all Cards are rendered.

project2.description-testimony: En esta puse en practica el sistema....
project2.description-testimony-smoll: In this one I put in practice the system of Cards where it is improved and also a system of individual tables is realized. I also created a slider where you can show more Cards.

project3.description-testimony: Jack Burger's menu offers a variety of delicious...
project3.description-testimony-smoll: Jack Burger's menu offers a variety of delicious burger options and irresistible sides to satisfy any craving. Try it now!

faq.faq1: What type of projects have you worked on in the past?
faq.faq1r: So far, I have created my portfolio, which is where you are now, some practice CRUDs using JSON, and currently, I am working on a notarial inventory system.
faq.faq2: How do you approach design and user experience (UX/UI)?
faq.faq2r: By looking at repositories and trends that can be observed by visiting various websites. I also use pre-styled components and aim to be as minimalist as possible.
faq.faq3: What processes do you follow in the development of a web project?
faq.faq3r: The main thing is to identify the type of project to be built and then create a plan on how to develop it in the best and simplest way for future easy maintenance.
faq.faq4: What is your experience with integrating third-party APIs?
faq.faq4r: At the moment, I am studying the implementation of APIs into my projects, but in the future, I will be one of the best at using APIs.
faq.faq5: Have you worked with any specific CMS?
faq.faq5r: Yes, I have worked with CMS in the early stages of my self-taught career, but later on, I realized that if I wanted to harness the full power of the web, it's better to do it with pure code and better technologies.
faq.faq6: How can I contact you to discuss a potential project?
faq.faq6r: You can fill out this contact form, where I will personally get in touch with you for more information.
